BB Media Posts Dec 30 The Blast Awards (Podcast) is here!!! - LLLaurie Nov 16 Julie's God 101 Interview w/ Lauren - moeopoly Nov 12 Vince opening his Big Brother box on his Youtube channel - moeopoly Nov 12 [RHAP w/ Taran:] Deep Dive w/ Morgan (7hr) - moeopoly Nov 9 Julie's God 101 Interview w/ Rylie - moeopoly More BB Media posts... Big Brother Updates ( REFRESH ) 8:17 PM PT Anddddd . Thats a wrap on BB27! A massive THANK YOU to all the updaters whove kept us informed this summer! Its not an easy job, but somebodys gotta do it. Until next season! -jdmoy03 7:39 PM PT (TV) The show closes. -Scott3325 7:38 PM PT (TV) Julie talks to Ashley. Julie and the House Guests with: "Love one another!" -Scott3325 7:35 PM PT (TV) Keanu wins America's Favorite House Guest. -Scott3325 7:34 PM PT (TV) Julie reveals the last votes - Ashley wins 6 to 1. Taylor wins the Fantasy award. -Scott3325 7:32 PM PT (TV) A staple every year --- from all of us who write, to all of you who follow along and read, thanks for being here. Another season in the books and we'll see you back Summer of '26! -ATC 7:31 PM PT (TV) Show closes. -ATC 7:31 PM PT (TV) Julie confirms at shows close that she will see everyone back next summer. -ATC 7:29 PM PT (TV) KEANU wins America's Favorite HG and a $50,000 prize with over 65% of the total vote. -ATC 7:28 PM PT (TV) Julie confirms the top 3 vote getters for America's Favorite HG was Rachel, Will and Keanu. -ATC 7:28 PM PT (TV) Julie announced Taylor won the BB fantasy game this year. -ATC 7:28 PM PT (TV) Julie confirms the final keys for Will and Rachel voted for Ashley. Final vote was 6-1. -ATC 7:27 PM PT (TV) Ashley celebrates. -Scott3325 7:26 PM PT (TV) Vince & Ashley hug. Ashley out the door. -Scott3325 7:25 PM PT (TV) Ashley exits to the always anticipated confetti welcome as the winner of Big Brother 27. -ATC 7:24 PM PT (TV) Julie pulls keys. Julie reveals Ashley as the winner. -Scott3325 7:22 PM PT (TV) Kelley with a vote for Ashley to make her the winner of Big Brother 27. -ATC 7:22 PM PT (TV) Lauren voted for Ashley. -ATC 7:21 PM PT (TV) Keanu voted for Ashley. -ATC 7:21 PM PT (TV) Ava cast for Ashley. -ATC 7:21 PM PT (TV) Morgan voted for Vince. -ATC 7:21 PM PT (TV) Julie now starting to pull keys to crown BB27 winner. -ATC 7:20 PM PT (TV) Rachel said she is shocked that her friends masterminded a hamster wheel of death that got her kicked out of the game. -ATC 7:18 PM PT (TV) The Mastermind reveal 2. -Scott3325 7:18 PM PT (TV) The Mastermind reveal 1. -Scott3325 More >>> BB Updates: Quick View ( old )| Forum | RSS | Twitter Highlights Become an updater... details here Joker's Chat Flashbacks July 20, 8:06 AM (Cam 1/2/3/4) Saturday Angela goes off on Matt... August 17, 03:24:30 to 3:27:30 AM BBT (Cam 1,2) Thursday MATT gets friendzoned after confessing to REILLY that he has a crush on her. "Alright buddy!"... October 29, 7:18:15 to 7:19:50 PM (Cam 3/4) Sunday Felicia takes a header (face plants) while making her bed October 27, 1:51:55 to 2:32:40 AM (Cam 1/2/3/4) Friday Matt HOH Room Reveal October 27, 5:20:20 to 5:21:10 AM (Cam 1/2/3/4) Friday Bowie sits up in her Scary BR bed complaining about her hands & fingernails. She finally decides she is half asleep. October 25, 8:59PM (Cam 1/2) Wednesday Felicia farts on Cirie's bed again and sprays her butt with cleaning spray. View More... Top TV Topics The Traitors Happy Banquet Day :) NT Sitcoms Happys Place Renewed for Season 3: Everything We Know So Far Streamed Shows Bridgerton Season 4 dropped today on Netflix! NT Night Manager .finished major Spoilers dont open if haven't finished Knight of the 7 Kingdoms, 100yrs. before GOT. Tonight Sunday 9ct HBO/Max . Y & R CBS plans The Young and the Restless daytime crossover with new soap Beyond the Gates Top Community Topics The Score Ok Here we go, Super Bowl & other news Lets start with a leaked Budweiser Anniversary Commercial ..American Icons Soooooo good! . Celebrity Buzz Catherine OHara, Schitts Creek and Home Alone Star, Dies at 71 Reports are circulating that Jay-Z has left the United States after his name The mention comes from an unverified FBI intake report included in a massive release of more than three million pages . Savannah Guthrie set to pull out of hosting Winter Olympics opening ceremony as mom Nancy remains missing The P/X It's FEBRUARY! YAY! We've made it through November, December and January and I consider this the half-way mark of winter, with DST only 5 weeks away! Speaking of DST, I can now report that we have Finally our roads cleared and downed trees moved to side for pickups but some still powerless. Now if we can just get the mailman to delivered our weather delayed mail and packages.
